snippet.title: 60 DAYS of Game Development in Under 3 Minutes!
snippet.description:
60 DAYS of Game Development in Under 3 Minutes!

We wanted to show you the progress of our action game "Jump Challenge!" on which we've been working for quite some time.
You can see how we progressed from concept to current stage.
Three people are working on the game right now. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1787630/Jump_Challenge/

Premiere: January 6, 2022

Jump Challenge! is an arcade game in which you must run away from the lava! To escape, you must face numerous obstacles such as spikes, shooting flowers, cacti, cannons, and much more! You can also race with your buddies or run away from lava together!
